```{r quantiles_by_test_part, echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE}


# a function to map the quantiles of target absent search times to
# target present search times.
getQuantiles <- function(pres,abs,probs) {
  present = quantile(pres,probs)
  absent = quantile(abs,probs)
  return(data.frame(probs, present,absent))
}

E1.quantiles_by_test_part <- E1.df %>%
  filter((test_part=='test1' | test_part=='test2') & RT>100 & correct) %>%
  mutate(cong = target==context)%>%
  group_by(subj_id,cong, test_part) %>%
  summarise(getQuantiles(
    RT[resp],
    RT[!resp],
    c(0.5,0.75,0.9,0.95)
  )) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c('present','absent'), names_to='resp', values_to='RT')

E1.quantile_congruency_effects_by_test_part <- E1.quantiles_by_test_part %>%
  group_by(subj_id, probs,resp,test_part) %>%
  summarise(diff = RT[cong]-RT[!cong]) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from=resp,values_from=diff)

E1.quantile_summary_by_test_part <- E1.quantiles_by_test_part %>% 
  group_by(subj_id) %>%
  mutate(centeredRT = RT-mean(RT))%>%
  group_by(cong,probs, resp,test_part) %>%
  summarise(mean_RT=mean(RT, na.rm=T),
            se_RT = se(centeredRT, na.rm=T)) %>%
  mutate(resp=factor(resp, levels=c('present','absent')),
         cong=factor(cong,levels=c(TRUE,FALSE), 
                     labels=c('cong.','incong.')))

E1.quantile_plot_by_test_part <- E1.quantile_summary_by_test_part %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=cong, 
             y=mean_RT, 
             # alpha=probs,
             color=test_part,
             group=interaction(probs,test_part))) +
  geom_line(size=1.3)+
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin=mean_RT-se_RT,ymax=mean_RT+se_RT))+
  facet_grid(~resp)+
  labs(x='',
       y='RT')+
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.pos='na')

ggsave('../docs/figures/E1Quantiles_separate_by_test_part.png',E1.quantile_plot_by_test_part,width=3.5,height=3.5);
```

```{r first_trials, echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE}

E1.first_trials <- E1.df %>%
  filter((test_part=='test1') & RT>100 & correct) %>%
  mutate(cong = target==context)%>%
  group_by(subj_id,cong,resp) %>%
  summarise(RT = RT[trial_index==min(trial_index)])

E1.quantile_congruency_effects_first_trials <- E1.first_trials %>%
  group_by(subj_id, resp) %>%
  summarise(diff = RT[cong]-RT[!cong]) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from=resp,values_from=diff)

E1.summary_first_trials <- E1.first_trials %>% 
  group_by(subj_id) %>%
  mutate(centeredRT = RT-mean(RT))%>%

  mutate(resp=factor(resp, levels=c(TRUE,FALSE),
                     labels=c('present','absent')),
         cong=factor(cong,levels=c(TRUE,FALSE), 
                     labels=c('cong.','incong.')))

E1.first_trials_plot <- E1.summary_first_trials %>%
```
